divs: Sighting DetailsI saw an object that was glowing from a light inside it that was about 4' tall and 3' in diam. move toward our house at about 100 feet high. I saw it about 300 yards from house at first and about it took about 1.5 min. for it to move over our house and then I lost site of it in the trees. I dismissed it first as someone that left something like a white trash bag go with some kind of light inside as a prank or just for kicks. I wouldn't have even considered reporting it but since the event my health has gone down hill and nothing has changed to cause it. This object also was on a direct path traveling 90 degrees from a lite breeze. This didn't make sense to me as it should have followed the same direction as the wind that nite. I had one other sighting in my life and that was 37 yrs. ago and now another one. has anyone seen this object on the nite that I mentioned? These are events that I deeply regret ever happened. I cannot go outside without having my eyes on the sky and the thoughts are constantly on my mind. I can't even enjoy the day to day things that I like to do without being consumed with the thoughts of UFOS or whatever you call what I am seeing. I need to do something about it but what? I know it's not an obduction and so glad it isn't but it feels pretty major to me and is effecting my life in ways that I don't like.
Summary: 3'-4' DIA. AT 100 FEET MOVED SLOWLY OVER HOUSE
trends: There have been no other sightings in Cochranton
This sighting has never been favorited.
